actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations

official_title: A bill to terminate the authorities of the executive and judicial branches of the Government which, in accordance with specific statutes, are subject to congressional review, unless such authorities are approved by enactment of the Congress.
short_title: Omnibus Delegated Powers Sunset Act of 1984

summary.text: Omnibus Delegated Powers Sunset Act of 1984 - Terminates authorities of the executive and judicial branches of the Government which, in accordance with specified statutes, are subject to congressional review, unless the exercise of such authorities is approved by an enactment of Congress.

titles.title: Omnibus Delegated Powers Sunset Act of 1984

A bill to terminate the authorities of the executive and judicial branches of the Government which, in accordance with specific statutes, are subject to congressional review, unless such authorities are approved by enactment of the Congress.
